          <title>
            <string language="en">Frosted glass and cotton blind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereifter Glas- und Baumwollvorhang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abat-jour givré en verre et de coton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cortina geada do vidro e do algodão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciechi glassati del cotone e di vetro</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Persiana helada del cristal y del algodón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that frosted glass and cotton blind are translucent materials.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß bereifter Glas- und 
Baumwollvorhang lichtdurchlässige Materialien sind-.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'abat-jour givré 
en verre et de coton sont les matériaux translucides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a cortina geada do 
vidro e do algodão é materiais translúcidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i ciechi glassati
del cotone e di vetro sono materiali traslucidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το παγωμένα γυαλί και 
το βαμβάκι τυφλά είναι διαφανή υλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la persiana helada 
del cristal y del algodón es materiales translúcidos.</string>
